thread.section_title: webuyanycar.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of webuyanycar.com | webuyanycarusa.com
thread.title: Lauren Schofield

author: Lauren Schofield
title: Lauren Schofield
text: From start to finish, webutanycar.com was an amazing experience. I was not sure to expect AND I have never tried to sell a car before...I was called 3 minutes after I submitted my online profile. The manager, Kevin, was polite and professional both on the phone and in person. When I arrived, I was greeted with a smile and handled with such professional precision. You could tell Kevin was experienced. My Quote: was accurate and I left with a check 50 minutes after I arrived and Ubered home! WOW...Thank you Kevin!
